H0.text: Completely clear the area is expected when conducting a scientific experiment in the field.

H1.text: Leaving the area as you found it is what you are expected to do when conducting a scientific experiment in the field.

H2.text: Taking anything you may need later is expected when conducting a scientific experiment in the field.

H3.text: Destroying specimens once you have observed them is what you are expected to do when conducting a scientific experiment in the field.

A4.text: in biology, field research typically involves studying of free-living wild animals in which the subjects are observed in their natural habitat, without changing, harming, or materially altering the setting or behavior of the animals under study
